seo.description: Full-stack web developer, I recently decided to become independent by creating AYCANDOO, my own company. Do you have an idea or a project for a website or web application? I can assist you both in its development and maintenance.

aycandoo.title: AYCANDOO
aycandoo.description: Showcase site for AYCANDOO, the structure I founded to sell my IT consulting and web development services. I create tailor-made websites or I do development missions directly for clients.

findyourpc.title: Find your PC - (BETA in progress)
findyourpc.description: Find your ideal PC with FindYourPC: this innovative application allows you to create custom configurations tailored to your needs, using new or used components. With a simple questionnaire and customizable criteria, easily identify the perfect desktop PC, whether it's for gaming, office work, or more demanding tasks.
